error.ButanukiAccountPreviouslyLinkedToOtherBi: This Butanuki account was previously linked to another Bity account.

results.phrase: If I had bought <currencyInput /> <itemPrice/> <nb>worth of Bitcoin</nb> rather than <object/> <frequency/> <nb>since <startInput/></nb>, <loader><nb>I would have saved</nb> <t>{{saved}},<t/> and <nb>I would own</nb> about <t>{{bitcoinAmount}}</t> worth <t>{{bitcoinValue}}</t> today, that is to say <nb>a <t>{{profitOrLoss}}</t></nb> <nb>of <t>{{profitLoss}}</t> <small>(<percentPL/>)</small>.</nb></loader>
results.share: If I had bought {{price}} worth of #Bitcoin rather than {{object}} {{frequency}} since {{start}}, I would have saved {{saved}}, and I'd own {{bitcoinAmount}}, worth {{bitcoinValue}} today, that is to say a {{profitOrLoss}} of {{profitLoss}} ({{percentPL}}).
